attributes.action: Change The Law So That MPs Will Only Be Elected on a 12 Month Contract
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In future elections all MPs will be elected on a 12 Month contract, and their performance to be appraised by their constituents, by means of "online" forums, and if not acting on demands of constituents, then their contract would be terminated. and a by-election called.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
